summary: Completed testing of new features: Onboarding Progress Dashboard, Notification Preferences page, and compliance status change notifications. All features working correctly. Fixed minor backend bug where GET /api/profile/notifications wasn't returning all default fields when preferences existed.

minor.issue: GET endpoint was not merging stored preferences with defaults - FIXED during testing

context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features fully tested and working: OnboardingStatusPage shows 5 steps with correct statuses, NotificationPreferencesPage has all 5 notification types with toggles, reminder timing buttons (7,14,30,60,90 days) work correctly, ProfilePage has link to notifications, Admin Jobs tab shows compliance check jobs with manual trigger buttons.

onboarding_status_api.details: Returns 5 steps with correct statuses (complete/in_progress/pending/failed/waiting), progress percentage, current step, next action

onboarding_status_page.details: Renders 5 steps with visual indicators, progress bar, properties/requirements count, 'Go to Portal' button when complete

notification_preferences_get_api.details: Returns all 5 notification types with defaults merged with stored preferences

notification_preferences_put_api.details: Updates preferences correctly, validates reminder_days_before (7,14,30,60,90 only)

notification_preferences_page.details: All 5 notification toggles work, reminder timing buttons (7,14,30,60,90 days) work, quiet hours section, save button with success toast

admin_jobs_compliance_check.details: Shows Compliance Status Check (Morning at 8AM, Evening at 6PM), Daily Reminders (9AM), Monthly Digest (1st of month 10AM). Manual trigger buttons available.
